item.title:
Nice essay by a historian about information revolutions.
"If we pour a precious new elixir into a leaky cup and it leaks, we need to fix the cup, not fear the elixir. " H/T @amcafee https://t.co/I2CVIzJeQ6

item.title: I was sure that Attention is All You Need is the most cited ML paper of all time. Nope! The Adam paper has more. 147,000 citations according to Google Scholar. I believe this makes it the 5th most cited paper of all time. Not even 10 years old!
